1: וַיְהִ֣י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> אַֽחֲרֵי־ <sup>310 </sup> <n>And it came to pass after this</n> כֵ֗ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> וַיִּשְׁאַל֩ <sup>7592 </sup> <n>enquired</n> דָּוִ֨ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>that David</n> בַּֽיהוָ֤ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> לֵאמֹר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> הַאֶעֱלֶ֗ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>Shall I go up</n> בְּאַחַת֙ <sup>259 </sup> <n>into any</n> עָרֵ֣י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the cities</n> יְהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>Judah</n> וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֵלָ֖יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> עֲלֵ֑ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>unto him Go up</n> וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> דָּוִ֛ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>And David</n> אָ֥נָה <sup>575 </sup> <n>Where</n> אֶעֱלֶ֖ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>Whither shall I go up</n> וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>? And he said</n> חֶבְרֹֽנָה׃ <sup>2275 </sup> <n>Unto Hebron</n>
2: וַיַּ֤עַל <sup>5927 </sup> <n>went up</n> שָׁם֙ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> דָּוִ֔ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>So David</n> וְגַ֖ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> שְׁתֵּ֣י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>thither and his two</n> נָשָׁ֑יו <sup>802 </sup> <n>wives</n> אֲחִינֹ֙עַם֙ <sup>293 </sup> <n>also Ahinoam</n> הַיִּזְרְעֵלִ֔ית <sup>3159 </sup> <n>the Jezreelitess</n> וַאֲבִיגַ֕יִל <sup>26 </sup> <n>and Abigail</n> אֵ֖שֶׁת <sup>802 </sup> <n>wife</n> נָבָ֥ל <sup>5037 </sup> <n>Nabal's</n> הַֽכַּרְמְלִֽי׃ <sup>3761 </sup> <n>the Carmelite</n>
3: וַאֲנָשָׁ֧יו <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> עִמּ֛וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> הֶעֱלָ֥ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>bring up</n> דָוִ֖ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>that [were] with him did David</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>each</n> וּבֵית֑וֹ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>with his household</n> וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and they dwelt</n> בְּעָרֵ֥י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>in the cities</n> חֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <sup>2275 </sup> <n>of Hebron</n>
4: וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> אַנְשֵׁ֣י <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> יְהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> וַיִּמְשְׁחוּ־ <sup>4886 </sup> <n>and there they anointed</n> שָׁ֧ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>and there</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דָּוִ֛ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>David</n> לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>over the house</n> יְהוּדָ֑ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> וַיַּגִּ֤דוּ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>And they told</n> לְדָוִד֙ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>David</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> אַנְשֵׁי֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>it was the men</n> יָבֵ֣ישׁ <sup>3003 </sup> <n>Jobesh</n> גִּלְעָ֔ד <sup>1568 </sup> <n>Gilead</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> קָבְר֖וּ <sup>6912 </sup> <n>[were they] that buried</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שָׁאֽוּל׃ <sup>7586 </sup> <n>Saul</n> ס
5: וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>sent</n> דָּוִד֙ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>And David</n> מַלְאָכִ֔ים <sup>4397 </sup> <n>messengers</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אַנְשֵׁ֖י <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> יָבֵ֣ישׁ <sup>3003 </sup> <n>Jobesh</n> גִּלְעָ֑ד <sup>1568 </sup> <n>Gilead</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> בְּרֻכִ֤ים <sup>1288 </sup> <n>unto them Blessed</n> אַתֶּם֙ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> לַֽיהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[be] ye of the LORD</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>because</n> עֲשִׂיתֶ֜ם <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that ye have shewed</n> הַחֶ֣סֶד <sup>2617 </sup> <n>this kindness</n> הַזֶּ֗ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> אֲדֹֽנֵיכֶם֙ <sup>113 </sup> <n>unto your lord</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> שָׁא֔וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>[even] unto Saul</n> וַֽתִּקְבְּר֖וּ <sup>6912 </sup> <n>and have buried</n> אֹתֽוֹ׃ <sup>853 </sup>
6: וְעַתָּ֕ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> יַֽעַשׂ־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>shew</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And now the LORD</n> עִמָּכֶ֖ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> חֶ֣סֶד <sup>2617 </sup> <n>kindness</n> וֶאֱמֶ֑ת <sup>571 </sup> <n>and truth</n> וְגַ֣ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> אָנֹכִ֗י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> אֶעֱשֶׂ֤ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>unto you and I also will requite</n> אִתְּכֶם֙ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> הַטּוֹבָ֣ה <sup>2896 </sup> <n>you this kindness</n> הַזֹּ֔את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>to you</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>because</n> עֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <sup>6213 </sup> <n>because ye have done</n> הַדָּבָ֥ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>this thing</n> הַזֶּֽה׃ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n>
7: וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> תֶּחֱזַ֣קְנָה <sup>2388 </sup> <n>be strengthened</n> יְדֵיכֶ֗ם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>Therefore now let your hands</n> וִֽהְיוּ֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לִבְנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>afflicted</n> חַ֔יִל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>able</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> מֵ֖ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>is dead</n> אֲדֹנֵיכֶ֣ם <sup>113 </sup> <n>for your master</n> שָׁא֑וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>Saul</n> וְגַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>and also</n> אֹתִ֗י <sup>853 </sup> מָשְׁח֧וּ <sup>4886 </sup> <n>have anointed</n> בֵית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and also the house</n> יְהוּדָ֛ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>me king</n> עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> פ
